name: random-sp-episode
description: Open up a random South Park episode

scripts.start: cpx 'src/ui/*.{html,css}' dist  --watch & watchify src/js/Main.js -o dist/random-sp-episode.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] & ./node_modules/.bin/watchify src/ui/options.js -o dist/options.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
